title: Beginner Blender Geometry Node Tutorial - Part 1

media:group.media:title: Beginner Blender Geometry Node Tutorial - Part 1
media:group.media:description:
Blender tutorial showing how to use Geometry Nodes to create sugar coated candy.

Part 2: https://youtu.be/V10GBrmYIDM

0:00 Getting started
01:16 Geometry nodes is a modifier
03:44 Distributing points
04:56 Joining Geometry
06:02 Creating Instances on Points
07:12 Pinning the Node Layout
07:45 Referencing another object in the nodes
09:04 How to randomize rotation
12:43 How to randomize scale

Download the final .blend file: https://www.dropbox.com/s/9zukqldna7fuiql/BlenderGuru_SugarCoatedCandy.blend?dl=0
